name: df-mfrel
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4
body: |- wceq(cmfr, cmpt(s0, universe, crab(s1, cpw(cxp(cfv(cmuv, cv(s0)), cfv(cmuv, cv(s0)))), wa(wceq(ccnv(cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wral(s2, cfv(cmvt, cv(s0)), wral(s3, cin(cpw(cfv(cmuv, cv(s0))), cfn), wrex(s4, cima(cfv(cmuv, cv(s0)), csn(cv(s2))), wss(cv(s3), cima(cv(s1), csn(cv(s4)))))))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ mFRel =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà P(((mUV ` s0)√ó(mUV ` s0)))|(`' s1 = s1 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà(mVT ` s0), ‚àÄ(s3 ‚àà(P((mUV ` s0))‚ãÇ Fin), ‚àÉ(s4 ‚àà((mUV ` s0)" { s2 }), s3 ‚äÜ(s1 " { s4 })))))})
comment: Define the set of freshness relations. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jul-2016.)
